Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses rrted EB: 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th & Term; WB: 95th, Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, & 95th due to street blockage at 95th/Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 95th/Eggleston.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, and into the Terminal.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th, Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.
